member.name: T:SharpLearning.RandomForest.Learners.ClassificationExtremelyRandomizedTreesLearner
member.summary: Learns a classification version of Extremely randomized trees http://www.montefiore.ulg.ac.be/~ernst/uploads/news/id63/extremely-randomized-trees.pdf

member.name: M:SharpLearning.RandomForest.Learners.ClassificationExtremelyRandomizedTreesLearner.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: The extremely randomized trees learner is an ensemble learner consisting of a series of randomized decision trees. It takes the randomization a step futher than random forest and also select the splits randomly
member.param: Number of trees to use in the ensemble
The minimum size for a node to be split
The maximal tree depth before a leaf is generated
Number of features used at each split in each tree
The minimum improvement in information gain before a split is made

The ratio of observations sampled with replacement for each tree. Default is 1.0 sampling the same count as the number of observations in the input. If below 1.0 the algorithm changes to random patches
Seed for the random number generator
Use multi threading to speed up execution (default is true)

member.name: M:SharpLearning.RandomForest.Learners.ClassificationExtremelyRandomizedTreesLearner.Learn(SharpLearning.Containers.Matrices.F64Matrix,System.Double[])
member.summary: Learns a classification Extremely randomized trees model

member.summary: Learns a classification Extremely randomized trees model
